SUBSCRIPTIONS.TITLE: Assinaturas - Perfil do usuário - Tuesmon
SUBSCRIPTIONS.PRIVATE_PROJECTS_LIMIT: Up to {{number}} private projects + Unlimited public projects!
SUBSCRIPTIONS.PRIVATE_PROJECTS_LIMIT_UNLIMITED: Unlimited private projects + Unlimited public projects!
SUBSCRIPTIONS.MEMBERS_LIMIT: Up to {{number}} different member accounts using any of your private projects!
SUBSCRIPTIONS.CONTACT_SUBSCRIBE: Subscribe to this plan by contacting us at support@tuesmon.com
SUBSCRIPTIONS.MAX_PRIVATE_PROJECTS: Gostaria de criar mais projetos privados? Veja mais planos!

MEMBERS.TITLE: Members
MEMBERS.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Currently this are the users that depends on your paid plan. You can remove then from all your private projects from the list bellow or you can manage their memberships in the configuration panel of each project
MEMBERS.NOTIFICATIONS_SELECT: Notify by mail increments of members

USER_PROJECTS_LB.TITLE: Private projects with {{user}}
USER_PROJECTS_LB.EXPLANATION: These are your private projects where {{user}} is counting for your paid plan. You can manage the presence of the members in the projects from the members panel.

CONTACT_LB.TITLE: Contato
CONTACT_LB.PLACEHOLDER: Please contact us and explain your needs
CONTACT_LB.SUCCESS: Sua mensagem foi enviada, retornaremos o mais breve possível.

REMOVE_USER_LB.TITLE: Tem certeza?
REMOVE_USER_LB.TEXT: Isso vai remover o usuário de TODOS os seus projetos privados.

HELP.WHY: Why do we think this might be the best plan for you?
HELP.NO_PROJECTS: You currently have no private projects so we believe that the  {{name}} plan might work great for you.
HELP.FEW_PROJECTS: You currently have {{private_num}} private projects so we believe that the {{name}} plan might work just fine for you.
HELP.NUM_PROJECTS: Since you currently have {{private_num}} private projects and {{public_num}} public projects we believe that the {{plan}} plan might be your best option.
HELP.NUM_PROJECTS_CUSTOM: Since you currently have {{private_num}} private projects and {{public_num}} public projects we believe that the Custom plan might be your best option.
HELP.UPGRADE: Making changes to your current plan is easy and can be done at any time!
HELP.PAYMENT: If you have more than 1 private project and you haven't yet subscribed to a payment plan, your private projects will be temporarily blocked. You don't need to worry, they will not be deleted. Once you confirm a subscription plan, they will become accesible again.
HELP.PUBLIC: Please remember that public projects don't count towards paid plans.

PAYMENT_HISTORY.CHANGE_DATA_SUCCESS: Ótimo! Você alterou seus detalhes de pagamento!

PLANS_SELECTOR.TITLE: Qual plano funciona melhor para você
PLANS_SELECTOR.CONTACT: If you need a paid plan allowing for more projects or more members per project contact us at support@tuesmon.com for further information.

CANCEL.TITLE: Cancel {{plan}} plan
CANCEL.IF_CANCEL: If you cancel your plan now:
CANCEL.IMPLICATION_1: You will go to the {{ plan }} plan but your projects will be deleted
CANCEL.IMPLICATION_2: Members of those projects will no longer be able to access them
CANCEL.ADVISE: If you do not want to lose the information, before canceling the plan, export your data from the Admin of each project.
CANCEL.SUCCESS: Congratulations, you successfully cancelled your plan!

DOWNGRADE.TITLE: Downgrade to {{plan}} plan
DOWNGRADE.MUST_CHANGE: To change to {{plan}} plan, you must first make the following changes
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS: If you have more than {{projects}} private projects
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION: Choose 1 project to remain private and make public or remove the rest projects. You can perform these changes on the upper menu cliking Manage Projects
DOWNGRADE.MORE_MEMBERS: If you have more than {{members}} members per private project
DOWNGRADE.MORE_MEMBERS_OPTION1: Go to Manage Members (Your plan) and keep a maximum of {{members}} members for all your private projects
DOWNGRADE.WHY_MAKE_CHANGES: Why do I have to make these changes?
DOWNGRADE.REASON_WHY: Unfortunately, you exceeded the maximum number of private projects or number of members allowed by {{ plan }} plan. This plan allows up to {{projects}} private projects and {{members}} members per private project
DOWNGRADE.ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to change this plan?

SELECT_PLAN.TITLE: Change your Plan
SELECT_PLAN.SUBTITLE: Choose the plan that best meets your needs
SELECT_PLAN.ABOUT_TO_CHANGE: You are about change to {{ plan }} plan
SELECT_PLAN.INTERVAL: How would you like to be charged?
SELECT_PLAN.TAXES: Depending on your country, we may be required to charge sales tax.
SELECT_PLAN.SUCCESS: Congratulations, you successfully changed your plan!
SELECT_PLAN.CANCEL_PLAN_ADVISE: When you cancel your {{ currentPlan }} plan you will subscribe to the {{ newPlan }} plan with basic features

PLAN_OPTIONS.FREE_NUM_USERS: Up to 3 members on private project
PLAN_OPTIONS.FREE_GBS: Up to 300MB of storage in private projects
PLAN_OPTIONS.ENTERPRISE_IDEAL_FOR: Ideal for large teams or organisations requiring special support to use Tuesmon on our tuesmon.com Cloud offering. Discounts apply automatically beyond the 30 and 100 user mark.
PLAN_OPTIONS.CURRENT_PLAN_DESCRIPTION: Currently in your private projects there are {{members}} members.
PLAN_OPTIONS.PER_MEMBER_YEARLY: Per team member when on a yearly plan
PLAN_OPTIONS.PER_MEMBER_MONTHLY: ${{ amount }}/mo per team member when on a monthly plan
PLAN_OPTIONS.FAIR_POLICY: Our fair pricing policy: we will adjust your invoice to ensure yor are charged every month only for the exact number of users you have active. Upgrade and downgrade as needed.

BLOCKED_PROJECT.ITS_ONLY_TEMPORAL: Não se preocupe, deve ser temporário
BLOCKED_PROJECT.TO_UNBLOCK_CHECK_YOUR_PLAN: Para desbloquear projetos, primeiro inscreva-se em um plano de pagamento que permita pelo menos tantos projetos privados como você atualmente
BLOCKED_PROJECT.TO_UNBLOCK_CONTACT_SUPPORT: Para desbloquear seus projetos contate support@tuesmon.com

PROJECT_RESTRICTIONS.PROJECT_MEMBERS_DESC_PRIVATE_SEED: O projeto que você está tentando importar tem {{members}} membros incluindo você, infelizmente, seu plano atual permite um máximo de {{max_memberships}} membros que é o máximo permitido para o Plano de Semente. Se você gostaria de adicionar mais membros, considere se inscrever em um plano pago.
PROJECT_RESTRICTIONS.PROJECT_MEMBERS_DESC_PRIVATE: The project you are trying to import has {{members}} members including you, unfortunately, your current plan allows for a maximum of {{max_memberships}} members per private project. If you would like to add more users please contact the administrator at support@tuesmon.com.

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE.TITLE: Unfortunately you current setup doesn't allow for more private projects
PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE.DESC: The project you are trying to import is private, unfortunately your current setup doesn't allow for more private projects. If you would like to raise that limit, you might want to consider changing your current plan.

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_MEMBERS.TITLE: Your current setup allows for a maximum of {{max_memberships}} members per private project

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE_MEMBERS.TITLE: Unfortunately your current setup doesn't allow you to add more private projects or activate more than  {{max_memberships}} members per private project
PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE_MEMBERS.DESC: Unfortunately, the project you are trying to import contains more than {{max_memberships}} members, which is the maximum allowed by your current setup. If you would like to import projects such as this one, you might want to consider changing your current plan.

CREATE.MAX_PRIVATE_PROJECTS: Infelizmente você alcançou a quantidade máxima de projetos privados permitidos
CREATE.MAX_PUBLIC_PROJECTS: Unfortunately, you've reached the maximum number of public projects.

PROJECT_TRANSFER.CANT_BE_OWNED: No momento, você não pode se tornar um proprietário de um projeto desse tipo. Se você gostaria de se tornar o proprietário deste projeto, entre em contato com o administrador em support@tuesmon.com.
PROJECT_TRANSFER.CANT_BE_OWNED_BY_MEMBERSHIPS: At the moment you won't be able to become an owner of a project of this type. If you would like to become the owner of this project please contact the administrators at support@tuesmon.com.

MEMBERSHIPS.LIMIT_USERS_WARNING_MESSAGE_FOR_ADMIN: If you would like to add more members, please contact the project owner {{ owner_email }}, who is currently authorized to upgrade the current plan.
MEMBERSHIPS.LIMIT_USERS_WARNING_MESSAGE_FOR_OWNER_WI: This project currently has {{members}} members, which is the maximum allowed. If you would like to add more members, please upgrade your plan.

CREATE_MEMBER.LIMIT_USERS_WARNING_MESSAGE_FOR_OWNER: You are about to reach the maximum number of members allowed for this project, {{maxMembers}} members. If you need more, please consider subscribing to a paid plan and if you already have one contact us at support@tuesmon.com.

TUESMON_APP.TITLE: Subscriptions - User Profile - Tuesmon
TUESMON_APP.SECTION_SUBTITLE: Want to use Tuesmon on your mobile?
TUESMON_APP.TUESMON_APP_DESCRIPTION: TuesmonApp is an application developed completely independent from Tuesmon.com but with which we have reached an agreement so you can use for free if you have a premium or enterprise plan
TUESMON_APP.TUESMON_APP_DOWNLOAD: Just download the application and synchronize your Tuesmon account entering next code:
TUESMON_APP.TUESMON_APP_VALID: This code is valid only for your Tuesmon account
TUESMON_APP.TUESMON_APP_DEVELOPED: TuesmonApp is developed by a totally independent team of Tuesmon.com.
TUESMON_APP.TUESMON_APP_SAT: To notify of any incident in the application, contact your customer service.
TUESMON_APP.TUESMON_APP_UPGRADE: If you want to enjoy free on your mobile, upgrade your plan!
